ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
Class CaptureFlag

java.lang.Object
  ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.CaptureFlag

public class CaptureFlag
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the main one and interacts with the other classes to perform the localization, navigation and zipline traversal.
